title: Weekly Review with Clay and Buck H1 - Mar 12 2022
itunes:title: Weekly Review with Clay and Buck H1 - Mar 12 2022
description:
Clay and Buck thank the listeners for coming out and seeing them in Houston at an awesome event. Buck promises to do more visits and "to see our folks" in "name any city." Clay thought the most entertaining part, of many, was when they booed when Buck said he was from NYC. Rubio argues eloquently against a no-fly zone in Ukraine. Blinken says we'll help Poland supply planes to Ukraine. Clay warns just don't know when Putin might say actions constitute act of war. Risk of America getting dragged into conflict with Russia. Biden's gas prices head to all-time high. Clay says it's not good for any of us to hit all-time record high each time we fill up our tank. MSNBC guest admits Trump's Russia policy was better. C&B take calls on gas prices.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Clay and Buck thank the listeners for coming out and seeing them in Houston at an awesome event. Buck promises to do more visits and "to see our folks" in "name any city." Clay thought the most entertaining part, of many, was when they booed when Buck said he was from NYC. Rubio argues eloquently against a no-fly zone in Ukraine. Blinken says we'll help Poland supply planes to Ukraine. Clay warns just don't know when Putin might say actions constitute act of war. Risk of America getting dragged into conflict with Russia. Biden's gas prices head to all-time high. Clay says it's not good for any of us to hit all-time record high each time we fill up our tank. MSNBC guest admits Trump's Russia policy was better. C&B take calls on gas prices.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
itunes:author: Premiere Networks
